name: Training Area
description:
Training Area - an FPS game that you wouldn't like to play.

This is a simple shooter game in which you're basically brought to different training installations (maps). CLear maps by shooting at the yellow mannequins and reach the extraction point.

To this release, the game is not finished, so expect bugs and incomplete levels. Some lacking features will be added soon.

Read the txt file, since it contains important info about the game.
